description.@en: As Thomas Paine said, “Of more worth is one honest person to society and in the sight of God, than all the crowned ruffians.”

system.notes:
Lawbreaker Trait

Professions of this Archetype are typically oath breakers or on the run from something or someone. They deal in lies, steal from the unwary and rabble-rouse to earn their keep, and with nothing to lose, they have little to fear.

effect.@en: Add an Assist Die whenever you make Guile Tests. In addition, you always succeed at Skill Tests to tell lies..
